body.name: Recliner Chair Massage Reclining for Adults, Comfortable Fabric Recliner Sofa Adjustable Home Theater Seating Lounge with Padded Seat Backrest, Small Recliners for Living Room, Bedroom (Deep Grey)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Modern Mode】：This recliner is fashionable, modern, and delicacy. Our recliner sofa will decorate your room. This single recliner is supported by four sturdy feet with unmarked pads that effectively protect the sofa and hard floors.

【Fabric and Upholstered Reclining Sofa】:This upholstered recliner features a combination of Fabric fabrication, a comfortable and soft headrest, back and waist support, and high-density sponge, handrails are comfortable and skin-friendly and easy to clean for increased comfort and durability, and modern recliners are of high quality and durable.

【Sturdy Recliner Chair】：Our adjustable recliner is constructed from a sturdy composite wood frame, a high-quality steel frame. The solid wood frame and widened base design make the massage chair more stable when lying flat, completely avoiding the danger of turning backward like someone else's chair. The robust recliner chair is capable of holding up to 275 lbs.

【Relaxation Single Sofa】：The single sofa is ideal for the living room, home theater, and bedroom. The recliner has a back that can be adjusted from 90° to 160° for reading, watching movies, and napping. You can enjoy your favorite sitting position in this adjustable recliner, whether you prefer to sit up straight, with your legs up, or lying flat on your back. With a simple push on the back, the recliner's footstool will pop out instantly and stop at any Angle from 0 to 90°.

【Easy to Assemble and Good Service】：Our winback chair massage sofa is easy to install, and only takes 2 minutes to install, just slip the back part of the club chair onto the base, screw four legs, connect the massage controller and power cable, then you're complete! If you have any problem with our club chair, please feel free to contact us. We offer our customers a 12-month replacement and 100% contentment assurance for this recliner chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I never do reviews
reviews.reviewText: This chair was SO easy to put together and it is pretty comfortable. The massage feature isn’t the best but it’s not bad for the price especially because I wasn’t really needing it for that feature. I’m 5’3-It leans back a perfect amount, my head can rest on it and your feet are actually up instead of at like a 45° angle. It seems to be made pretty well and like I said for the price, you can’t beat it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair to use in my bedroom. It's the perfect size. I assumed that I would get what I was paying for, but I think it is much better. I don't use it daily for long hours, but most evenings for an hour or two. The massage piece works. But if u are expecting a deep tissue, this isn't for you. It's good for relaxing. Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I was skeptical, but ended up being surprised.
reviews.reviewText: I got sick of using those racing seat style gaming chairs (I’m 37 and with a bad back), and I needed a good replacement. Came across this chair and after researching the reviews, I decided to pull the trigger. I ordered some caster wheels right away as well. Chair came well packaged and took a whole 5 minutes to put together. I was surprised that it fit me, I’m 6’1” 215lbs, and I was pleasantly surprised that it has a pretty decent build quality to it. I went ahead and screwed the caster wheels to the bottom of the frame and viola! I created a nice plush gaming chair! The massage feature is kind of a cheap gimmick but some may find it useful.

reviews.reviewerName: Total garbage.  Had it two months. Broken. It's a joke. Don't buyTotal garbage.  Had it two months. Broken. It's a joke. Don't buy
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you find a better recliner for under $150 let me know. Easily would spend $300+. Really comfortable. 8 very different vibration modes patterns, with speed variations. Took less than three minutes to set up. A monkey could do it. If you're a bigger person, it's probably not for you though. I'm 6'2" 220. I still fit fine, but it could be a little bit bigger. If you're smaller than that you will have no problems. In my experience, the electronics in any of these usually go bad sooner than later. Also you tend not to use the electronics as much, so not a big deal. Just got it today and it's great. No problems so far. Great value for the money. John in Cincinnati.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It will do
reviews.reviewText: Dint expect much bc it's 100 dollar recliner heated at that but where can u go and get for this price I am 5'7 well over 250 and I fit in it no one else can of course and it's a little short with hight but yet again for pricing I won't complain fits perfectly in a small room would be better for a smaller teen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a great product and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: My husband has been asking for one of these for a while. I was hesitant to purchase one because they are usually bulky and heavy. After reading the reviews I purchased this one and am so glad I did. As is noted, the assembly is easy. Just two pieces, with the back easily sliding into the base. It is a little more compact so keep that in mind when considering size. Also, there are two different ways to 'recline'. The first is your standard feet up and leaning back slightly. The second is more of a full extension reclining (Think lying down). Again, not bad in any way, just something to consider. The massage is a great bonus, and for the price it can't be beat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price! Great chair when on a budget.
reviews.reviewText: I was very happy to see that this chair is comfortable, looks good, well priced, and strong. I am 5'2" and 230 lbs, and my husband is 5'9" and 160 lbs and we both fit well in the chairs with room to spare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty kool stuff.
reviews.reviewText: Just received it today and assembly is a breeze. It's comfortable enough, we'll just have to see how long it stays in it's original shape. So far, i am pleased with the purchace.
